citations.narrative:
(c) Two cases of cardboard enrichment hutches were improperly stored in an old equipment room. These
enrichment hutches are used in the primary animal enclosures and must be stored properly to prevent
contamination. The two cases of cardboard enrichment hutches were removed from this area during the inspection,
however this area must be cleaned and organized before husbandry items are stored in this space. To be corrected
by: March 14, 2014.
Exit interview conducted with facility representative.

narrative:
3.125(c)
FACILITIES, GENERAL.   
(c) Two cases of cardboard enrichment hutches were improperly stored in an old equipment room.  These
enrichment hutches are used in the primary animal enclosures and must be stored properly to prevent
contamination.  The two cases of cardboard enrichment hutches were removed from this area during the inspection,
however this area must be cleaned and organized before husbandry items are stored in this space.  To be corrected
by:  March 14, 2014.
Exit interview conducted with facility representative.
